notesStmt.note: Imperfect at the beginning. Lacuna after folio 8. Many of the extant leaves are more or less damaged.
Previous user's entries, partially illegible: inscribed with a date of 5476 (1716); folio 212v.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A second volume belonging to a series of Karaite service-books, which have been originally deposited in the Karaite Synagogue in Jerusalem.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Oriental square and semi-cursive script of the 16th to 17th century.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine title: 'Karaite Prayer Book. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2532.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882; inscribed, folio [214v].
